snippet.title: Metal: Hellsinger Gameplay | First Look
snippet.description:
In this Metal: Hellsinger gameplay, you'll see it's a first person rhythm shooter that's got a heavy metal soundtrack.  There's no firm Metal: Hellsinger release date yet, but it will be in 2021. It’ll be available on PC, PlayStation 4 and 5, and Xbox One and Series X. What you're seeing here is our first look at Metal: Hellsinger, it's pre-alpha footage.

► Visit us on the web: http://www.VG247.com
► Like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/VG247
► Follow us on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/VG247

As you watch the video you'll hear the recognisable voice of Troy Baker, alongside a soundtrack comprised of Metal icons such as Matt Heafy from Trivium, Mikael Stanne from Dark Tranquility, Bjorn Strid from Soilwork, and Alissa White-Gluz from Arch Enemy. It's a heavy metal rhythm game with proper heavy metal music that gets more intense the better you are at shooting and slashing demons. 

Metal: Hellsinger is being created by David Goldfarb, who was the Game Director on Payday 2, and Lead Designer on Battlefield 3 and Battlefield: Bad Company 2. The Outsiders is an independent game studio based in Stockholm, Sweden. A team of about 30, made up of industry veterans from places like Machine Games, Guerilla Games, Arrowhead, Fatshark and many more.

...and don't forget to subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/MrVG247

#MetalHellsinger #MetalHellsingerGameplay #MetalHellsingerFirstLook
